thread.title: CEO Secrets: 'Why I employ autistic people'
thread.title_full: CEO Secrets: 'Why I employ autistic people' - BBC News

author: BBC
title: CEO Secrets: 'Why I employ autistic people'

organizations.name: dougal shaw on twitter and facebook

text:
Kurt Schoeffer, head of IT company Auticon, explains why he actively seeks to employ autistic people.
This is a special edition of CEO Secrets to mark Disability Works week .
Shhh! Get all the #CEOSecrets on our website here and watch this video explaining the series .
To keep up to date with the CEO Secrets series and go behind the scenes, follow series producer Dougal Shaw on Twitter and Facebook .
